definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: This means village committees, mostly controlled by party appointees, will surely retain considerable say over any land deals.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着村委会对任何土地交易有相当大的发言权。

sentences.english: Section one described the present situation and influence of the VCC.
sentences.chinese: 文章第一部分阐述了村委会选举的基本情况和影响。

sentences.english: Village councils actually vote to select the midwife candidates from their own community.
sentences.chinese: 村委会在自己社区投票选出助产妇候选人。
